page.title: 20Lord Rhodes
page.content: One of the best known personalities of the area is{Lord Rhodes of {Saddleworth}who attained his 90th birthday on August 12th 1985. {Harvey Rhodes}was born to a working family in Saddleworth in 1895. He spent his early life working in Huddersfield, Canada and the armed services. After World War 1 he set up his own mill in Dobcross where he was keen to improve the working and living conditions of his workers. He became a {Labour Member of Parliament}for Ashton-Under-Lyne nd later served as {Lord Lieutenant of Lancashire. He has received many{honours}for his political and community services, becoming Lord Rhodes of Saddleworth in 1964 and receiving the Order of the Garter in 1985. He still lives in Dobcross and takes an active interest in public life.
